name: Slapshot
0:
”Alexa, ask Slapshot when is Vancouver's next match”
”Alexa, ask Slapshot when are Toronto and Ottawa playing next”
”Alexa, ask Slapshot what was the score from Philadelphia's last game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: slapshot
des:
This unofficial skill allows you to get details on the following:

- match results
- upcoming fixtures for a given team or pair of teams
- fixtures on a given date

A large list of nicknames for the teams is included, but please let me know if any are missing! matt.northsky@gmail.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
